title: Watermelon Crew LFM. Diam III+ Pref (Advanced game knowledge required)
body:
Watermelon crew is looking to revamp the team, due to personal problems or inactivity most of players left the team.

we're currently recruiting for a competitive team, with full intention of competing in lans events, as well as open ladder and the potential for ocs/other opportunities with hardwork and dedication.

Im looking for selfless players, people with good advanced knowledge at the game who can help us to improve, but also people who listen and improve themselves.

Only apply if you're tolerant to work and play as a team, have patience with a non-toxic attitude and are willing to play a minimum of 4 days a week R5s.

Scheduled practice and games will be everyday after 5:30.

Requirements:
- Have mic
- Use skype or TS
- At lease soloqueue D5, R5's experience is a bonus
- Good and friendly attitude
- Keen to make friends and see your teammates as friends.
- Able to take orders and follow instructions

If you meet the requirements please comment below your -
IGN:
IRL name:
Age:
Rank:
Position:
Best 5 champ:
Availability:

Add Dr watermelon or Rockmeion for more info.
